category.display_value: NeedItアプリケーションの仮想エージェントトピック

sys_cb_topic.description: ユーザーがNeedItレコードを更新できるようにするトピック。
sys_cb_topic.name: BS Test Update NeedIt Records

sys_update_version.name: sys_cb_topic_6fe47907dbd800109d5f8a184896196d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_cb_topic"><sys_cb_topic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><applicability/><category display_value="NeedItアプリケーションの仮想エージェントトピック">8b99d3badb9000109d5f8a184896198c</category><connect_queue/><description>ユーザーがNeedItレコードを更新できるようにするトピック。</description><flexible_conversation_switching>false</flexible_conversation_switching><graph>{
  "goals": {
    "9536f68c9238421b8532cb9b0ffecf85": {
      "id": "9536f68c9238421b8532cb9b0ffecf85",
      "trigger": {
        "type": "primary"
      },
      "name": "primary",
      "applicability": "",
      "description": "",
      "nodes": {
        "a02e04084d744aa19654ec6c356a3a93": {
          "id": "a02e04084d744aa19654ec6c356a3a93",
          "stepType": "Start",
          "name": "Start",
          "greetingResponse": {
            "value": "リクエストの種類のNeedItレコードを見つけて更新するのを手伝います。",
            "mode": "simple"
          }
        },
        "8ae9bd89b1d94f27a18653dc4279123e": {
          "id": "8ae9bd89b1d94f27a18653dc4279123e",
          "stepType": "TerminateGoal",
          "name": "End",
          "confirmationMessage": {
            "value": "他のNeedItレコードを更新する必要がある場合は、もう一度確認してください。",
            "mode": "simple"
          }
        },
        "9d59961753fc4a4f9e179af9750a9704": {
          "stepType": "ChoicePrompt",
          "name": "NeedIt Type",
          "prompt": {
            "value": "どのタイプのNeedItレコードを表示しますか？",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "confirmMessage": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "acknowledgeMsg": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "optional": false,
          "defaultValue": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "variableId": "bb866a1f9f3a402d960603cf11564614",
          "id": "9d59961753fc4a4f9e179af9750a9704",
          "withNluUserInput": false,
          "skipIfFulfilled": false,
          "entity": ""
        },
        "7887bfd6ead443cd9036bb4f1d4a2b84": {
          "id": "7887bfd6ead443cd9036bb4f1d4a2b84",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Confirm NeedIt Type",
          "value": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n\t    // Return the display value (Label) for the needit_type choice\n\t    return 'You selected: ' + vaInputs.needit_type.getDisplayValue();\n\t})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "3f54f1998ee24367b6b99461d5cce35d": {
          "stepType": "ReferenceChoicePrompt",
          "name": "NeedIt List",
          "prompt": {
            "value": "表示するNeedItレコードを選択します",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "confirmMessage": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "acknowledgeMsg": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "optional": false,
          "defaultValue": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "variableId": "ee9bd57e4f244a3ab47d5da71797ea16",
          "id": "3f54f1998ee24367b6b99461d5cce35d",
          "mode": "external",
          "script": "(function execute(table) {\n\t\n\t    // Initialize an array for the list of NeedIt records to show\n\t    var options = [];\n\t\n\t    // Query the table selected in the Table field for active records with the \n\t    // u_request_type selected in the NeedIt Type node where the user is the \n\t    // u_requested_for. Order the results by the When needed value.\n\t    var grNI = new GlideRecord(table);\n\t    grNI.addQuery('u_request_type',vaInputs.needit_type.getValue());\n\t    grNI.addQuery('active','true');\n\t    grNI.addQuery('u_requested_for',vaInputs.user);\n\t    grNI.orderBy('u_when_needed');\n\t    grNI.query();\n\t\n\t    // Push a value and label pair to the array for each record the query returns.\n\t    // The value is the unique value. The label is the number, u_when_needed, and\n        // short_description values for the NeedIt record.\n\t    while(grNI.next()) {\n\t        options.push({ 'value': grNI.getUniqueValue(), 'label': grNI.getValue('number') + \" (\" + grNI.getDisplayValue('u_when_needed') + \"): \" + grNI.getValue('short_description') });\n\t    }\n\t\n\t    // Return the array\n\t    return options;\n\t\n\t})(table)",
          "noRecordsResponseMsg": {
            "value": "開いているNeedItレコードがありません。",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "condition": {
            "value": "(function execute(table) {\n\t\n\t    // Initialize an array for the list of NeedIt records to show\n\t    var options = [];\n\t\n\t    // Query the table selected in the Table field for active records with the \n\t    // u_request_type selected in the NeedIt Type node where the user is the \n\t    // u_requested_for. Order the results by the When needed value.\n\t    var grNI = new GlideRecord(table);\n\t    grNI.addQuery('u_request_type',vaInputs.needit_type.getValue());\n\t    grNI.addQuery('active','true');\n\t    grNI.addQuery('u_requested_for',vaInputs.user);\n\t    grNI.orderBy('u_when_needed');\n\t    grNI.query();\n\t\n\t    // Push a value and label pair to the array for each record the query returns.\n\t    // The value is the unique value. The label is the number, u_when_needed, and\n        // short_description values for the NeedIt record.\n\t    while(grNI.next()) {\n\t        options.push({ 'value': grNI.getUniqueValue(), 'label': grNI.getValue('number') + \" (\" + grNI.getDisplayValue('u_when_needed') + \"): \" + grNI.getValue('short_description') });\n\t    }\n\t\n\t    // Return the array\n\t    return options;\n\t\n\t})(table)",
            "mode": "external_script"
          },
          "withNluUserInput": false,
          "skipIfFulfilled": false,
          "entity": ""
        },
